UK Imports / Exports to balance
Responsible department: Department for Business, Innovation and Skills

As the UK shows trade deficits with many countries, overall, the situation is un-sustainable. It is proposed that the UK negotiates with all our trading partners .The uk government to obtain agreements that they take from the UK, equivalent value goods and services. Imports/Exports to balance .If necesssary the British government would impose import quota restrictions .
